title: Chrome has a new ‘Privacy Guide’ that explains security settings
content:
Chrome’s settings page has a lot of options and toggles, to the point where it can be intimidating. That’s probably why Google is rolling out a new feature called ‘Privacy Guide,’ which aims to walk people through all of the important settings. Google said in an announcement, “when you navigate through Privacy Guide, you’ll learn

The post Chrome has a new ‘Privacy Guide’ that explains security settings appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is rolling out a new Privacy Guide that walks you through some of Chrome's most important security settings.
